name: MERCURE
description:
IN A MYSTERIOUS CASTLE

Maëva is locked.

THERE IS A MURDERER

Maëva want a Messenger to carry of the castle's Heart to escape.

AND TIME AND REALITY ARE CONFUSED

Will June be the Messenger that will break the chain ?

A mostly narrative game about time lost in things and an obsession.

[Playtime: Around 30 minutes to 1 hour]

[Made in 72h with RPG Maker XP and mapped with only one tileset for the 1st RPG Maker Jam ]

[In game langage selection between English and French !]
